data.title: Mudhal Murai Lyrics - Neethaane En Ponvasantham Movie Songs Lyrics
data.text:
Mudhal murai paartha nyabagam uyirinil thanthu pogiraai

Idhayathil yeno oru baaram mayai varum maalai neraththil

Manathinil vanthu pogiraai vizhiyinil eno oru eeram

Sila neram maayam seithaai, sila neram kaayam seithaai

Madi meethu thoonga vaithaai, maru naalil yenga vaithaai

Veyila mazhaiya valiya sugama ena nee

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Muthal murai paartha nyabagam uyirinil thanthu pogiraai

Idhayathil yeno oru baaram mayai varum maalai neraththil

Manathinil vanthu pogiraai vizhiyinil eno oru eeram

Neenthi varum nilavinile oru aayiram nyabagangal

Neenganedum kanaavinile nooraayiram thee alaigal

Nenjemenum vinaak kalukkul en bathil enna pala varigal

Serum idam vilaasathile un paarvayin mugavarigal

Oodalil ponathu kaalangal ini thedida nerangal illaiye

Thedalil nee varum osaigal angu ponathu un thadam illaiye

Kaadhal endral verum kaayangala athu kaathalukku adaiyaalangalaa

Veyila mazhaiya valiya sugama ena nee

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Ponvasantham ponvasantham

Muthal murai paartha nyabagam uyirinil thanthu pogiraai

Ithayathil yeno oru baaram mayai varum maalai neraththil

Manathinil vanthu pogiraai vizhiyinil eno oru eeram

Sila neram maayam seithaai sila neram kaayam seithaai

Madi meethu thoonga vaithaai maru naalil yenga vaithaai

Veyila mazhaiya valiya sugama ena nee

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Neethaane en ponvasantham

Movie Name : Neethaane En Ponvasantham - 2012

Song Name : Mudhal Murai

Producer : Reshma Ghatala, Venkat Somasundaram, Elred Kumar, Jayaram

Director : Gautham Menon

Cast : Jiiva, Samantha, Santhanam, Anupama Kumar

Music Director : Ilaiyaraja

Lyrics - Lyricist : Na Muthukumar

Singer's : Sunidhi Chauhan

Movie Release Date : February 14, 2012
